headline: UDR, Inc. Announces Appointment of Dave Bragg as Chief Financial Officer
summary: DENVER, June 23, 2025--UDR, Inc. (the "Company") (NYSE: UDR), a leading multifamily real estate investment trust, today announced the appointment of Dave Bragg as Chief Financial Officer ("CFO"), effective July 24, 2025. Mr. Bragg succeeds Joe Fisher, who in January 2025 was appointed to the role of Chief Investment Officer ("CIO") in addition to his responsibilities as the Company’s President.
